attributes.action: TAKE NOTE. We the citizens of Great Britain are sick and tired of paying out more money and getting told Britain is better than it has ever been, when it is clearly not.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Where do I start: school behaviour standards, standards of behaviour generally in both adults and children, school leaver standards, gun crime increasing, customer service... need I go on. From parking where they shouldn't to abusing innocent people, we all must have examples of frustration at the lack of standards in this country. No punishment follows, yet be accused of failing to submit a form to the Revenue and have a £900 fine. Guilty before proven innocent. I am setting up a website to list the grievances I have personally. Am I the last person in Britain with standards, a lone voice in the wilderness... I hope not. Britain, does it make you proud....?

rejection.details: You need to create a specific call-to-action for your petition
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
